attributes.action: Stop A Level and GCSE students having 'mock style' exams and have coursework set
attributes.additional_details: Coursework is concrete evidence of a students capability and is a fair way of them being tested for all subjects.
attributes.background: The whole point of cancelling exams is for students not to sit exams, but we are being told that we might sit exams but marked by teachers which defeats the whole purpose of not sitting exams. Instead of exams, we now have 4+ months to complete coursework that exam boards can set.

rejection.details: Deciding whether to hold mock exams is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.
